path: artifacts/AgriUT Smart Contract Audit Report - QuillAudits.pdf

project_path.AgriUT: contracts/AgriUT Smart Contract Audit Report - QuillAudits/AgriUT

findings.title: Governance Issues
findings.description: The role owner has the authority to transfer user tokens, freeze user accounts, and burn user tokens.

findings.title: Absence of error messages in require statements
findings.description: Adding error messages to require() statements helps provide a description about the error faced by the user.

findings.title: Missing Events for Significant Transactions
findings.description: No event is emitted for significant transactions, making it difficult to track off-chain liquidity fee changes.

findings.title: Floating Pragma
findings.description: Contracts should be deployed with the same compiler version and flags that they have been tested with thoroughly.

findings.title: Public function that could be declared external
findings.description: Some public functions can be declared as external to save gas.
